originalText.text: Joe and Allejandro of V.I.P. Tours are the best! The quality of food and drink, the depth of knowledge about NYC and the unparalleled care given to everyone on the tour is unmatched with anyone else. My highest recommendation!

text.text: Joe and Allejandro of V.I.P. Tours are the best! The quality of food and drink, the depth of knowledge about NYC and the unparalleled care given to everyone on the tour is unmatched with anyone else. My highest recommendation!

originalText.text: My husband and I had never taken a formal tour—and we've both been to New York City countless times—but V.I.P. Tours of New York curated such a magical and complete immersion into Broadway that we learned much that we didn't previously know. One unexpected delight was the vast and deep architectural/historical knowledge of Joe Rosenberg, who guided us through Times Square, Lower Manhattan and Brooklyn Heights, and offered an annotated lesson in this vibrant city. V.I.P. arranged excellent seats for us at the three shows that we saw; planned lovely receptions for our group, and booked us at the very posh Knickerbocker Hotel. Joe and Alejandro were attentive to every detail, and they clearly enjoyed taking care of everyone.This was a first-class experience from start to finish, and I highly recommend V.I.P. if you want to *really* see New York and immerse yourself in all things Broadway.

originalText.text:
Joe & Alejandro! We cannot thank you enough for such a magical, whirlwind Broadway Adventure for a trip of a lifetime.
THANK YOU for the excellent planning and extraordinarily special experiences. Your historical insight, connections and admiration is unparalleled.
ALL the stories, amazing food, behind the scenes tours & private entertainment ~ on in addition to the stellar seats & Broadway shows. It was truly the full experience, exceeding our expectations.
Appreciate your careful planning, attention to detail, and the stellar herding of cats, lol! BRAVO!
THANK YOU again for an amazing and memorable time. We can't wait to come back!

originalText.text: Joe Rosenberg, and Alejandro Almaguer of VIP Tours are definitely the ROCK STARS of Tour Experiences. I wouldn't go again with anyone else. Their professionalism, knowledge, compassion, care and their skills for this type of adventure are beyond GREAT. The entire experience, not just from my perspective, but those Friends on the tour, definitely EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS. When do we go again?

text.text: Joe Rosenberg, and Alejandro Almaguer of VIP Tours are definitely the ROCK STARS of Tour Experiences. I wouldn't go again with anyone else. Their professionalism, knowledge, compassion, care and their skills for this type of adventure are beyond GREAT. The entire experience, not just from my perspective, but those Friends on the tour, definitely EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS. When do we go again?

originalText.text: Fabulous way to spend a week in NYC! This was our second annual trip with a Group and it was beautifully run. Everything is so well planned, on-time, excellent hotel, exceptional food/restaurants, great Broadway show seats and Joe knows everything about EVERYTHING! Joe & Alejandro are great hosts, and answer emails and texts quickly and are just kind and fun to be around. I rarely write reviews, but this one is an easy 5* "must-do" if you want the best!
